```diff
+ import {
+   Component,
+   ChangeDetectionStrategy,
+   signal,
+   computed,
+   inject,
+   DestroyRef,
+   OnInit
+ } from '@angular/core';
+ import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common';
+ import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router';

+ interface Card {
+   title: string;
+   desc: string;
+   img: string;
+   tag: string;
+   color: 'orange' | 'blue' | 'green' | 'pink' | 'purple';
+ }

+ interface Theme {

+   slug: string;

+

+   readonly isHovered = signal(false);

+   readonly titleLine2 = signal('');

+   private typeInterval: ReturnType&lt;typeof setInterval&gt; | null = null;
+   private loopTimeout: ReturnType&lt;typeof setTimeout&gt; | null = null;

+       title: 'ç”œé» Â· æ³•å¼è‰è“å¡”',

+       img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1488477181946-6428a029177b?auto=format&amp;fit=crop&amp;q=80',
+       tag: 'ä¸‹åˆèŒ¶',

+       img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565557623262-b51c2513a641?auto=format&amp;fit=crop&amp;q=80',
+       tag: 'ç•°åœ‹æ–™ç†',
+       color: 'purple'
+     }
+   ];
+ 
+   ngOnInit(): void {
+     this.startTypingCycle();
+     this.startAutoCycle();
+ 
+     this.destroyRef.onDestroy(() =&gt; {
+       this.clearAllTimers();
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   // Auto Cycle Logic
+   private startAutoCycle(): void {
+     if (this.autoCycleInterval) {
+       clearInterval(this.autoCycleInterval);
+     }
+ 
+     this.autoCycleInterval = setInterval(() =&gt; {
+       if (!this.isHovered()) {
+         this.activeIndex.update(index =&gt; (index + 1) % this.cards.length);
+       }
+     }, 2500);
+   }
+ 
+   // Typewriter Logic
+   private startTypingCycle(): void {
+     this.titleLine1.set('');
+     this.titleLine2.set('');
+     let charIndex1 = 0;
+     let charIndex2 = 0;
+ 
+     this.typeInterval = setInterval(() =&gt; {
+       if (charIndex1 &lt; this.targetLine1.length) {
+         charIndex1++;
+         this.titleLine1.set(this.targetLine1.slice(0, charIndex1));
+       } else if (charIndex2 &lt; this.targetLine2.length) {
+         charIndex2++;
+         this.titleLine2.set(this.targetLine2.slice(0, charIndex2));
+       } else {
+         if (this.typeInterval) {
+           clearInterval(this.typeInterval);
+         }
+         this.loopTimeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; {
+           this.startTypingCycle();
+         }, 5000);
+       }
+     }, 100);
+   }
+ 
+   private clearAllTimers(): void {
+     if (this.autoCycleInterval) clearInterval(this.autoCycleInterval);
+     if (this.typeInterval) clearInterval(this.typeInterval);
+     if (this.loopTimeout) clearTimeout(this.loopTimeout);
+   }
+ 
+   // Interaction Handlers
+   onMouseEnter(): void {
+     this.isHovered.set(true);
+   }
+ 
+   onMouseLeave(): void {
+     this.isHovered.set(false);
+   }
+ 
+   onCardClick(index: number): void {
+     const relativeIndex = (index - this.activeIndex() + this.cards.length) % this.cards.length;
+     if (this.isHovered() &amp;&amp; relativeIndex === 0) {
+       // TODO: Navigate to recipe detail
+       console.log(&#96;å·²é¸æ“‡é£Ÿè­œï¼š${this.cards[index].title}&#96;);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   isCardActive(index: number): boolean {
+     const relativeIndex = (index - this.activeIndex() + this.cards.length) % this.cards.length;
+     return relativeIndex === 0;
+   }
+ 
+   // Style Calculators
+   getBadgeColorClass(color: string): string {
+     const colors: Record&lt;string, string&gt; = {
+       orange: 'text-orange-600 bg-orange-100 border-orange-200',
+       blue: 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100 border-blue-200',
+       green: 'text-green-600 bg-green-100 border-green-200',
+       purple: 'text-purple-600 bg-purple-100 border-purple-200',
+       pink: 'text-pink-600 bg-pink-100 border-pink-200'
+     };
+     return colors[color] || colors['orange'];
+   }
+ 
+   getCardStyle(index: number): Record&lt;string, string | number&gt; {
+     const relativeIndex = (index - this.activeIndex() + this.cards.length) % this.cards.length;
+     const totalCards = this.cards.length;
+ 
+     if (this.isHovered()) {
+       // Stack State
+       return {
+         zIndex: totalCards - relativeIndex,
+         transform: &#96;translateY(${relativeIndex * 15}px) scale(${1 - relativeIndex * 0.05})&#96;,
+         opacity: relativeIndex &gt; 3 ? 0 : 1 - relativeIndex * 0.2,
+         filter: relativeIndex === 0 ? 'none' : 'blur(1px)',
+         cursor: relativeIndex === 0 ? 'pointer' : 'default'
+       };
+     } else {
+       // Fan State
+       let fanIndex = relativeIndex;
+       if (relativeIndex &gt; totalCards / 2) {
+         fanIndex = relativeIndex - totalCards;
+       }
+ 
+       const fanRotation = fanIndex * 12;
+       const fanX = fanIndex * 90;
+       const fanY = Math.abs(fanIndex) * 20;
+ 
+       return {
+         zIndex: totalCards - Math.abs(fanIndex),
+         transform: &#96;translateX(${fanX}px) translateY(${fanY}px) rotate(${fanRotation}deg) scale(0.95)&#96;,
+         opacity: 1,
+         filter: 'none',
+         boxShadow: '0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
+         cursor: 'default'
+       };
+     }
+   }
+ }
+
```

```diff
+   getCardPosition(index: number, total: number): { left: string; top: string } {
+     const angle = (index * 360) / total;
+     const radius = 100;
+     const rad = (angle - 90) * (Math.PI / 180);
+     const x = Math.cos(rad) * radius;
+     const y = Math.sin(rad) * radius;
+ 
+     return {
+       left: &#96;calc(50% + ${x}px - 32px)&#96;,
+       top: &#96;calc(50% + ${y}px - 44px)&#96;
+     };
+   }

+     const colors: Record&lt;string, string&gt; = {
+       'ç‚': '#ef4444',
+       'æ°´': '#3b82f6',
+       'åœ°': '#d97706',
+       'é¢¨': '#22c55e',
+       'å…‰': '#eab308',
+       'ç¥': '#a855f7'

+     return colors[element] || '#6b7280';
```

```diff
+   ngOnInit(): void {
+     // è¨ˆç®—äº”èŠ’æ˜Ÿé ‚é»åº§æ¨™
+     this.calculatePentagramPoints();
+     
+     // å»¶é²è§¸ç™¼äº”èŠ’æ˜Ÿç¹ªè£½å‹•ç•«
+     setTimeout(() =&gt; {
+       this.pentagramDrawn.set(true);

+   // è¨ˆç®—äº”èŠ’æ˜Ÿ5å€‹é ‚é»çš„åº§æ¨™
+   private calculatePentagramPoints(): void {
+     const points: PentagramPoint[] = [];
+     const startAngle = -90; // å¾é ‚éƒ¨é–‹å§‹ï¼ˆ-90åº¦ï¼‰
+     
+     for (let i = 0; i &lt; 5; i++) {
+       const angle = startAngle + (i * 72); // æ¯å€‹é ‚é»ç›¸éš”72åº¦
+       const radian = (angle * Math.PI) / 180;
+       points.push({
+         x: this.PENTAGRAM_CENTER.x + this.PENTAGRAM_RADIUS * Math.cos(radian),
+         y: this.PENTAGRAM_CENTER.y + this.PENTAGRAM_RADIUS * Math.sin(radian),
+         angle: angle
+       });
+     }
+     
+     this.pentagramPoints = points;
+   }
+ 
+   // ç²å–äº”èŠ’æ˜Ÿ SVG è·¯å¾‘ï¼ˆç”¨æ–¼ç¹ªè£½æ˜Ÿå½¢ç·šæ¢ï¼‰
+   getPentagramPath(): string {
+     if (this.pentagramPoints.length !== 5) return '';
+     
+     // äº”èŠ’æ˜Ÿçš„é€£æ¥é †åºï¼š0-&gt;2-&gt;4-&gt;1-&gt;3-&gt;0
+     const order = [0, 2, 4, 1, 3, 0];
+     const pathParts = order.map((idx, i) =&gt; {
+       const point = this.pentagramPoints[idx];
+       return i === 0 ? &#96;M ${point.x} ${point.y}&#96; : &#96;L ${point.x} ${point.y}&#96;;
+     });
+     
+     return pathParts.join(' ');
+   }
+ 
+   // ç²å–å¡æ§½åœ¨ç‰¹å®šä½ç½®çš„æ¨£å¼
+   getSlotStyle(index: number): { left: string; top: string } {
+     if (index &gt;= this.pentagramPoints.length) {
+       return { left: '50%', top: '50%' };
+     }
+     
+     const point = this.pentagramPoints[index];
+     return {
+       left: &#96;${point.x}px&#96;,
+       top: &#96;${point.y}px&#96;
+     };
+   }
+ 
+   // ç²å–å¡ç‰‡åˆ°ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä½ç§»é‡ï¼ˆç”¨æ–¼èåˆå‹•ç•«ï¼‰
+   getConvergeTransform(index: number): { tx: string; ty: string } {
+     if (index &gt;= this.pentagramPoints.length) {
+       return { tx: '0px', ty: '0px' };
+     }
+     
+     const point = this.pentagramPoints[index];
+     return {
+       tx: &#96;${this.PENTAGRAM_CENTER.x - point.x}px&#96;,
+       ty: &#96;${this.PENTAGRAM_CENTER.y - point.y}px&#96;
+     };
+   }
  
    // æ–°å¢é£Ÿæåˆ°æ‰‹ç‰Œ
```

```diff
+       }, 2000);
+     }, 500);
    }
  
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
+   addRandomIngredient(): void {
+     // å–å¾—ç›®å‰æ‰‹ç‰Œä¸­å·²æœ‰çš„é£Ÿæåç¨±
+     const existingNames = new Set(this.hand().map(card =&gt; card.name));

+     // éæ¿¾æ‰å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„é£Ÿæ

+       name =&gt; !existingNames.has(name)
+     );
+     
+     // æ²’æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„é£Ÿæäº†

+       return;
+     }

+     const dbEntry = INGREDIENT_DB[ingredientName];
+     
+     const newCard: IngredientCard = {

+     };
+
```
